name: EDBONG
description:
EDBONG:

Welcome to EDBONG, a nervous cooperative rogue like, where you are bounded until death by an unbreakable chain to your partner.

This chain is not only a constraint but is your only chance to succeed.

  

You are thrown in a dark futuristic space prison, but the time to escape with your best mate has come. . In order to break through, you will have no choice but to cooperate if you want to survive.

Will you be brave enough to face the monstruosities that lies ahead and carry your way out?

 

 You will go through a randomly generated dungeon which makes every run different.

As you go down the levels, you will fight different ennemies with their own style, and face epic bosses with unique patterns and strategies .

But, you wont find great swords or magical powers, your survival depends on the chain.

This chain is and will be your only weapon throughout the game, and will allow you to kill the various enemies and bosses by many different interactions with it.

They will challenge you, but remember that the stronger your frienship is, the stronger the chain will be !

 

 

What we are aiming for :

  • Randomly generated dungeon,
  • +15 unique items : speed boots, elemental potions…
  • +25 different ennemies : flying, exploding, magical…
  • 4 complex epic Bosses
  • 2 different game mods : story and survival

 

We are still developing the game BUT you can already download our playable prototype and try it out ;)

We hope that you will like it as much as we do creating it and we’d love to have your feedbacks !

You will find on social media all the cool news about it, for exclusives artworks, game design documents, previews trailers, devblogs.
